content.p: Assistant Professor, Faculty of Social Sciences Dr Kah Mun currently holds the role of an assistant professor of finance at Nottingham University Business School. She completed her PhD in Finance at the University of Nottingham Malaysia (UNM), focusing on behavioural finance. Before her doctoral journey, Dr Kah Mun pursued her educational foundation with a Bachelor of Arts (BA) and a Master of Science (MSc) in Finance and Investment from Sheffield Hallam University (SHU). Dr Kah Mun is engaged in both undergraduate and postgraduate levels. Her teaching portfolio includes: Undergraduate Modules: Postgraduate Module: Before joining UNM, she delivers in various areas, encompassing Case Studies in Finance and Investment, Equity Analysis, Personal Financial Planning, Principles of Investment, and Fundamentals of Finance. Dr Kah Mun's primary focus is conducting multidisciplinary research to gain insights into human behaviour when making investment decisions.
